response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $750,000. This exceptional piece is not just an item but a testament to craftsmanship and quality that surpasses expectations. I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or serve as a significant asset in your endeavors. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.", "product_price": 750000}
